tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RentalProperties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255),
    property_type VARCHAR(50),
    property_location GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
    rental_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    rental_duration VARCHAR(20),
    property_rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE rental_properties (
  property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(255),
  location GEOMETRY(POINT),
  rental_price DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE rental_trends (
  trend_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id UUID,
  rental_date DATE,
  rental_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  occupancy_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE rental_hotspots (
  hotspot_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  hotspot_location GEOMETRY(POLYGON),
  average_rent DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE RentalProperties (
  property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_name VARCHAR(255),
  property_type VARCHAR(50),
  location POINT,
  rental_price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE RentalTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  trend_date DATE,
  average_rental_price DECIMAL(10,2),
  hotspot BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE rental_properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    address TEXT NOT NULL,
    city TEXT NOT NULL,
    state TEXT NOT NULL,
    zipcode TEXT NOT NULL,
    geolocation GEOGRAPHY NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rental_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_date DATE NOT NULL,
    hotspots_geolocation GEOGRAPHY NOT NULL
);
